general_advisory: Kharif crop 2024: 1. Due to Forecast of Light rainfall from 11th Sept. Farmers are advised to donâ€™t apply fertilizer & chemical during this period. 2. Strengthen the bunds of paddy field and check any rat holes or leakage from the bund. 3. After rain trim the bund and keep clean to avoid any insect multiplication.

advisory: If BPH is seen, then spray with Pyometrizine 50% @ 120 g/ha. If the BPH attack is seen, postpone application of nitrogenous fertilizer.
To manage Pod borer in green gram and black gram crop spray Emamectin Benzoate 5% SG @ 80 -gram/ acre or Chlorantraniliprole 18.5 % SC @80 -ml/acre or Profenophos 50 % EC @ 400 -ml/acre.
Go for the thinning operation and maintain optimum plant population.
Due to weather there is chances of Aphids in Maize, to manage this, apply Dimethoate @ 2 ml/liter of water.
Due to weather Leaf blight disease is seen, to manage this spray Mancozeb @ 4 ml/liter of water.
Keep provision of drainage of excess water.
Provide staking to the newly planted saplings to avoid from wind damage. Go for intercropping with pulses in newly developed orchard.
Due to weather there is chances of Brinjal Fruit & Shoot Borer attack, to manage this apply T. chilonis @ 20 ,000 per acre.
Due to rainfall, do not allow water to stagnant near the base of the crop.
Provide regular feeding @ 0.35% of body mass.
Provide mineral mixture to increase milk productivity in animals.
